At Sat, 18 Jul 2009 10:40:10 +0800,
Utsav Saraf wrote:
>
> Hi Erik,
> The error is in the import sun.net.www.protocol.fileUrlConnection. It says
> the sun.net cannot be resolved. So I commented out the portion using
> fileUrlConnection and it compiled without error but still showed build
> failed with 408 warnings. On the last line it mentioned a file plugin.jelly
> and nothing about it. I am frustrate trying to get this thing to build. Not
> sure how am I going to work with this. Any help would be much appreciated.

Hi Utsav -

Heritrix 1.14.3 uses Maven 1.0.2 so be sure that you are using that
version of Maven.

The sun.net code is Sun javac specific. I suspect that you may have a
non-Sun javac installed. If you are running Ubuntu install the
sun-java6-jdk package.

You could also consider using the binary distribution of Heritrix if
you are do not need to modify the source code, that way you do not
need to build at all.

best,
Erik Hetzner

--Multipart_Fri_Jul_17_21:11:26_2009-1
